text: COVID restrictions have reduced efficiency of services across the board.

text: They left the pizzas at the wrong address without speaking to anyone. Manager first said that someone had accepted the delivery then changed their story to the driver had left it on the porch. The manager offered half price on our order to â€¦More

text: YOU DELIVERED MY FOOD TO THE WRONG HOUSE!! I donâ€™t know where it is!!  ALSO I tried to call and they wouldnâ€™t answer, thanks for nothing!!

text: slow. always slow. it feels like a burden to order because i know theyre not gonna get it right or in a timely manner. someone has truly out pizzad the hut. and it's my ex wife. ask your wife, girlfriend, mother or even sister to make you a pizza. 2 stars.

name: Libby Prater
text: For me the pizza wasnt that good .

text: We ordered Cheesy Stuffed Garlic Knots and a veggie pizza.. Both were not good. In fact, we threw away the garlic knots. The pizza base was very hard.

name: Amy Lucas
text:
It's pretty good.
I get pizza at the MT Vernon pizza hut sometimes, I think it might taste better. Overall it's good. I will keep going back

text: My favorite, The Hut.

name: Wilma Johnson
text: This is the 2and time I've ordered in a month and both times my orders were short of my order never did get what I ordered or a refund... sure would be nice to hv a pizza place to order good cheese sticks from .... what food we did get wasn't worth having :(

name: Tony Sebren
text: Ordered marina pasta with bread sticks extra marina and hot wings. Told 30-40 minutes. 1.5 hours later received chicken alfredo no marina and hot wings. Local store would never answer.

name: Letha Wilburn
text: Ordered today for porch deliver order was over $40.00 never got it. I called after an hour wait they had delivered to wrong address. I had to drive to store to get refund. I told them my address 3 times. Terrible customer service!

name: Dottie Williams
text: Great pizza picked up at curbside.

name: Can Do Auto Repair
text: Best wings around since kfc changed their recipe

name: Paula Campbell
text: I ordered for someone else to pick up the order. When she got there some girl was working the counter and it took her 5 minutes to come out and acknowledge that someone was there. Then her phone rang and she went back behind a wall to talk â€¦More

name: Mary McCartney
text: Worst Pizza Hut experience we have had! Cold food, wrong food, missing food, no customer service ...SKIP BEREA , KY. PIZZA HUT!!!!! â€¦More

name: B B
text: No seal on outside of pizza box. For the millionth time why do you charge for sauces and never put them in the box. Thief. Horrible just like papa John's. No customer service skills at all

name: Luke McCowan
text: Ordered online. Large order was completed on time and pizza tasted great. Will definitely order from again!

name: Jason Swinney
text: Excellent

text: Worse pizza I have ate in years. Where is the sauce? Horrible!

name: Roger Sullivan
text: Terrible service. Ordered on the website for pickup. I asked about one of the sauces I ordered they told me their store doesn't have that particular sauce. That's fine but I was charged for it anyway. Had a long wait while they hashed out a way to credit me. Don't eat here !

name: HotasL
text: I ordered pizza online and for the 3rd time in a row this Pizza Hut has gotten our order wrong. The first time the pizza was completely wrong and the driver took it back and brought the right one. The 2nd and 3rd time I ordered a large with â€¦More

name: Brena Griffin
text: My pizza was cooked perfectly, with just the right amount of sauce, cheese and toppings! The delivery driver arrived earlier than expected and was the kindest young man- even cracked a joke! You could really tell he enjoyed his job! All around, great service!

name: Greg Satterly
text: I went into the Berea Hut on 11/10/17. I asked them if I could add an order of wings to my order. They replied to me that their fryer has been down 3 or 4 days and it would be at least a week before it is fixed. That's totally unacceptable. â€¦More

name: Jennie Young
text: Manager by the name of Michael, was super nice, food was sooo good!

name: Brandon Platt
text: Great service great food

name: JerryRhonda Stepp
text: Disappointed with this being a carry out only, did have a small table to eat at inside (had to ask for a napkin) but listening to the workers in the back cuss ("f" word) with every other word and throw things took away from the delicious pizza. Will not be back and would not recommend.

name: Charles Davis
text: Hard to beat the pizza ðŸ˜‚ here.

name: Chad Hembree
text: This particular location is carry out only so don't be deceived by the large building. The service is okay and the food is on par with most other Pizza hut franchises. Delivery is also available for the general Berea area.

name: Lindsay Coleman
text: Slow service even had a pick up order, that i had to wait a additional 30 mins on was charge 2 times more then my order. Would never order from here again

name: Dot Thomas
text: Clean friendly host. Pleasant atmosphere

name: Shannon Peters
text: They screwed up my order 3 times... For some reason they feel it was my fault lol next time it will be Domino's for me

name: Bryce Anderson
text: Very friendly service and delicious pizza! They have come a long way since these past poor reviews. My wife and I agree, it is the best pizza place in Berea hands down

name: Flonk Bob
text: Good pizza. Quick. Only edible pizza in Berea.

text: The pizza here is the best in town

text: Service was good but the place was a little messy. Normally it's in good shape

name: Spencer Wood
text: I cannot speak for others, but I've ordered at least 20 pizzas from this location, usually pick up orders, and it has always been on time and cooked to perfection. No service for dining in, but there are tables so you can still eat there if you want to.

name: margarita maust
text: Love the food

text: Good food but no rest rooms.  This is a take out place, not dine in. Friendly staff.

name: TCE BKY

name: Matthew Bailey
text: Has went way downhill caused by poor management. Instead of addressing poor product and customer service they just simply choose to downgrade. Instead of keeping a fresh/clean buffet they just remove the entire dining room.  Slow delivery â€¦More

name: Carlton McGee
text: It was terrible.  I was the only customer, and they got my order wrong!!!  They acted like it was my fault.  I mean, I WAS THE ONLY CUSTOMER!  How does that even happen?

name: Tisha W
text: Hot fresh Fast wish they would extend the delivery

name: Randall Gooding
text: Went through on my way home from family vacation. Dirty bathrooms. Burnt bread stick, that took 25 minutes to get, the back of the plates were dirty. The second set of plates were just as dirty. So I hope the guy walking around with the â€¦More

name: Clarisa Williams
text: TERRIBLE DELIVERY SERVICE!!!!!!!! I WAITED 2 HOURS AND 30 MINUTED FOR A PASTA!!!!! The manager yelled at me through the phone stating that I received a call for the food when I never did. But the food was good....

name: Alicia Dean
text:
Delivered us expired food!  Manager is very rude and hung up on me.  This place needs to be closed down if they can't find management that will do their job

Don't eat here.

name: Mary Baker
text: Just didn't like the pizza at all

name: Spencer Prewitt
text: Pizza hut is great, unless its at berea. All of our orders are subpar and they occasionally refuse to deliver to me when I'm within their range. And pray they don't over cook your pizza because I've seen softer cardboard.

name: TJ Denney
text: Have ordered delivery multiple times and it's always at least an hour to two hours before I get it. When you call to see where it's at they always give the excuse of being "really busy" and that their "delivery driver should be back any â€¦More

name: Michael Ferguson
text: Lol what a joke i just called to order a pizza was asked to please hold. Ok no problem but 17 min later i was just disconnected i called back and again was instantly told please hold 9 min later i just hung up and will take my orders for pizza somewhere else from now on.

name: Shawn Moody
text: I no longer do business with this establishment. Too many things to say that are negative. My advice, keep moving and find another place to get pizza. Papa John's is around the corner.

name: Maya Kawaguchi
text: Went there with a friend and it has the most friendly customer service I have ever had! Good food and good environment :D

name: Randol Brown
text: They don't go overboard on toppings

name: Martha Combs
text: Good pizza, wonderful workers.

name: JKay Thomason
text: To start off, let me say I love Pizza Hut. I have nothing against this delicious chain. It has been an amazing crutch to lean on when needed. The following opinion is solely about this exact Hut in Berea, Ky. It is based on true events and â€¦More

text: They had to cancel my order last week because they ran out of wings. And again they cancelled my order today because they were "running behind" why even bother??? Might as well order from somewhere else.

text: The pizza was the worst pizza that we have had from pizza hut and we will not eat there again

text: Pizza was raw crust was not cooked enough  I woke up in the middle of the night sick, I will never eat at any pizza hut again, due to Berea, KY location not being able to cook pizza the right way

name: Feyheart
text: We used a couple Book it coupons to get the personal pizzas for the kids. Not much seating though, four two seat tables self service. However they let us move two tables together as long as we put them back when done. Stick to the on sale menu and you won't spend much additional if you buy for mom and dad too.
